channel.title: Deleting/Adding NPC Drops
channel.description:
at the moment im trying to remove all the barrows drops from the barrows brothers so i can add a minigame.
i go to NPCDrops.cfg, found barrows codes and deleted the drops. saved and ran file (dont need to compile for CFG files.)
i go back on my server, kill the brother and i still get a drop.
where else do i go to change monsters drops?
my source is "revolution" if that helps in anyway.
thanks

item.title: Deleting/Adding NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @nabster nabster
item.description:
@nabster wrote:

drops are in Item2.java file just find name which is similar to monster like for barrows in my source its [code]public static int Ahrim[] = {4708, 4710, 4712, 4714};
public static int randomAhrim()
{
return Ahrim[(int)(Math.random()*Ahrim.length)];
}

public static int Guthan[] = {4724, 4726, 4728, 4730};
public static int randomGuthan()
{
return Guthan[(int)(Math.random()*Guthan.length)];
}

public static int Karil[] = {4732, 4734, 4736, 4738};
public static int randomKaril()
{
return Karil[(int)(Math.random()*Karil.length)];
}

public static int Torag[] = {4745, 4747, 4749, 4751};
public static int randomTorag()
{
return Torag[(int)(Math.random()*Torag.length)];
}

public static int Verac[] = {4753, 4755, 4757, 4759};
public static int randomVerac()
{
return Verac[(int)(Math.random()*Verac.length)];
}

public static int Dharok[] = {4716, 4718, 4720, 4722};
public static int randomDharok()
{
return Dharok[(int)(Math.random()*Dharok.length)];
}

}[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2008, 06:32:53 am[/size][hr]btw, any1 knows how to edit amount of drop? if i want drop 995(coins) like 5m so how should i write the drop? (995;5000000) or like what?

Read full topic

item.title: Deleting/Adding NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @Excorsist Excorsist
item.description:
@Excorsist wrote:

you dont need to compile cfg files for them to update, ive added many npc’s to autospawn without compiling.

ive compiled it anyway and still not working.

Read full topic
